snippet: Miriam Eisenstein-Drachler, an evacuee from the Belle Harbor Manor nursing home in Far Rockaway, Queens, wrote about some of the storms she has seen.
abstract: Miriam Eisenstein-Drachler, an evacuee from the Belle Harbor Manor nursing home in Far Rockaway, Queens, wrote about some of the storms she has seen.

headline.main: An Evacuee's Letter From the Park Slope Armory
